description: A technical mystery combining investigation and network exploration

dialogues.intro:
Welcome to the Network Investigation Interface.
Your objective: analyze captured artifacts and trace the origin of anomalous network transmissions.
Start by exploring your local files and connected systems.
dialogues.victory: OPERATION COMPLETE! - Mainframe accessed and evidence archived.

hints.start: Try reading welcome.txt and notes.txt in your home directory
hints.credentials: Hidden files start with a dot (.). Use 'ls -a' to see them
hints.bbs: Connect to BBS using: telnet darknet.bbs.net
hints.password: Combine password fragments from different sources
hints.ssh: SSH to mainframe.local after finding the complete password
